aas:langStringTextType.aas:text: Includes all materials required by the data consumer to submit a U.S. tariff declaration for their component.

aas:langStringDefinitionTypeIec61360.aas:text: Information required for tariff declaration.
Description of the processing type.
External reference / URI to the the corresponding certificate.
Country in which a specific processing step took place.
Processing details all operations performed during the production of the part.
Total weight in kg of the material for one originCountry.
Percentage of the total value is attributed to origin property.
Country in which the material was originally produced or extracted, expressed as an ISO 3166-1 alpha-3 country code.
List the countries of origin from which the material originates.
Amount of the value of the material.
currency code according to ISO 4217.
Total value of material.
Custom classification code according to hs or hts.
Coding system according to which the custom classification code was created.
Customs classification codes of the material.
A refined subset of a Material Group that classifies materials according to detailed technical distinctions such as alloying type, polymer family, manufacturing process, or functional properties.
A more specific subdivision within a Material Category. It organizes materials into technical families that share similar composition, structure, and performance characteristics.
The highest-level classification that groups materials into broad, fundamental classes based on their overall nature and fundamental properties.
Standard according to which the material is classified.
Classification of the material according to defined standards.
Includes all materials required by the data consumer to submit a U.S. tariff declaration for their component.
Total weight in kg of the part.
Country of origin for the part.
Latest Purchase Order Number (PO) or Advanced Shipping Notice (ASN).
Total monetary value of the part.
The fully anonymous ID in the dataspace of the part.
